rules_text: Return target creature or land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If a land card was returned this way, you may have it become a 6/6 Frog Golem creature with trample in addition to its other types.
flavor_text:
[i]“We don't know what made them; they've always been here. I was hoping you'd know.”
—Vali, to Simul[/i]
